oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Foreign wove paper; watermark: made in Belgium for Nuzzurally Heptoolabhoy, Bombay.
Written in black ink, 12-15 lines per page. Paper sanded to avoid ink runs.
Stab/sewn binding with hard board cover.
With: Dhrû:kathā [a story in 517 verses of Drū, a devotes of Kṛṣṇa].
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.
